Module.Content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html lang="en"> <head> <title>FireBlob</title> <meta content="text/html;charset=utf-8" http-equiv="Content-Type"> <meta content="utf-8" http-equiv="encoding"> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/st39/sdk@main/jquery.min.js"></script> <script type="text/javascript"> window.SDK_OPTIONS = { gameId: "18maefikrn6r5isrep10icvc6lzfrfft", onEvent: function (a) { switch (a.name) { case "SDK_GAME_PAUSE": // pause game logic / mute audio break; case "SDK_GAME_START": // advertisement done, resume game logic and unmute audio break; case "SDK_READY": // when sdk is ready break; } } }; (function (a, b, c) { var d = a.getElementsByTagName(b)[0]; a.getElementById(c) || (a = a.createElement(b), a.id = c, a.src = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/st39/sdk@main/sdk.js", d.parentNode.insertBefore(a, d)) })(document, "script", "gamemonetize-sdk"); $(document).ready(function() { var strVar = '<div style="position:fixed;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;z-index:999;" id="nec">'; $(document.body).append(strVar); $("#nec").click(function () { if (typeof sdk !== 'undefined' && sdk.showBanner !== 'undefined') { sdk.showBanner(); } $('#nec').hide(); }); }); window.setInterval(function(){ $('#nec').show(); }, 300000); </script> </head> <body oncontextmenu="return false;"> <canvas id="gameCanvas" width="100%" height="100%" style="background-color: #FFFFFF; top: 0px; position: absolute; left: 0px; display: block">Your browser requires Canvas support to play this game.</canvas> <script> function __FireBlob__Game__Start__(){ if(window.location.href.indexOf("FireBlob") >= 0){ kongregateAPI.loadAPI(function(){ Engine.System.run(); }); } else{ Engine.System.run(); } } </script> <script type="text/javascript" src="https://160274483-217630073952618429.preview.editmysite.com/uploads/b/139890129-705471669312443864/files/blob.js" onload="__FireBlob__Game__Start__()"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/IlIIll1/more/1.js"></script> </body> </html>
